prompts: Create a crab-like Pokemon with a bright orange shell and white claws.
Generate a water-type Pokemon featuring a large claw and a tough exterior.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in coastal regions, showcasing a vibrant red and white color scheme.
Design a Pokemon resembling a crustacean, known for its powerful pinchers and aquatic abilities.
Show me a Pokemon that uses its large claws for both defense and offense in battles.
Make a Pokemon with a sturdy body and striking colors that lives in the ocean depths.
Give me a Pokemon that combines the features of a crab with fierce battle instincts.
